AzureBlade looked at the newcomer. He had no doubt that this Hydras
was indeed the new form of Megatron... He decides to follow him and
Perceptor. Wether he liked it or not, he'd have to deal with Hydras.

AzureBlade: Hydras, I have been eager to meet you. I have much to
tell, and so have you.

He was perfectly cold headed. Hydras did not scare him.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC:
> Aerosmith ask me if I can control Hydras for some weeks.
> 
> Hydras/Perceptor
> 
> "ME!!"Said a Harsh voice
> 
> "MAster Hydras????"said Perceptor
> 
> "I heard Perceptor that you had two new comers visiting us"
> 
> "Yest master, I..."was starting to say the male while Hydras 
> interrupted him "Well, let's goo to Meeting Room. There we can chat 
> more comfortable..."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: So Perceptor, whom shall I have the honor to meet?
